'''Starconches''' are [[Liyue]] [[Local Specialty]].

==How to Obtain==
Starconches are primarily found on the beaches of Liyue; some can notably be found in [[Guyun Stone Forest]], on [[Yaoguang Shoal]], and on the western end of the beach in [[Dragonspine]] which connects with Yaoguang Shoal.

See the gallery or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=78 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

Additionally, the following NPCs give Starconches after following a certain dialogue branch for the first time:
*[[Miss Bu]] at [[Yaoguang Shoal]], [[Liyue]] (3 Starconches)

==Trivia==
*3 Starconches are needed to get the present from [[Little Yue]] to [[Changchang]] in [[A Lone Ship In Guyun]].
*A few Starconches are found on [[Dragonspine]]'s southern shore, even though this area is supposed to be a part of [[Mondstadt]].
*Starconches could also be found in the [[Golden Apple Archipelago/1.6|Golden Apple Archipelago]] during [[Version 1.6]]. It was one of three Local Specialties that could be obtained then, the others being [[Dandelion Seed]]s from [[Mondstadt]] and [[Sea Ganoderma]] from [[Inazuma]].
*The following birthday mails included Starconch:
**[[Mail/When You're Free... (2022-04-17)|Xiao's 2022 Birthday Mail]] (5 Starconches)
